Title: Thailand’s PTT seeks six April LNG cargoes through tender
Description: Thailand’s state-owned PTT has issued its third tender in as many weeks to buy LNG cargoes for delivery in April to its 11.5 mtpa Map Ta Phut LNG receiving facility in the country’s Rayong province. The tender closes tomorrow.
Author: CK

Title: Germany to expedite LNG terminal construction in Brunsbüttel and Wilhelmshaven: Scholz
Description: Germany has decided to expedite the construction of LNG terminals in Brunsbüttel and Wilhelmshaven as part of a policy to secure energy supply for the country, German chancellor Olaf Scholz said.
Author: CK

Title: Germany has sufficient gas stocks to get through winter; preparing for next winter: Minister
Description: Germany has secured sufficient volumes of gas for the current winter season and sees gas supply within the European Union as secure, even in the event of a complete halt in Russian gas supplies, Federal Minister of Economics Robert Habeck said.
Author: CK

Title: Shell will do what it can to supply market with LNG amid sanctions against Russia
Description: Shell is closely monitoring the situation concerning sanctions against Russia and will do what it can to manage any disruptions to LNG supplies as a result of sanctions imposed against Russia in the wake of its unprovoked invasion of Ukraine.
Author: CK
